Case# PersonNameComponentsFormatter.Style.abbreviated

iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case abbreviated
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/style-swift.enum/abbreviated#Discussion)

The maximally abbreviated form of a name. See “[Abbreviated](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter#Abbreviated)” for details about its specific behavior.
